tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_misconduct (
  allegation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  allegation_date DATE NOT NULL,
  allegation_description TEXT,
  investigation_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending'
);

CREATE TABLE research_misconduct_allegations (
    allegation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    allegation_description TEXT,
    institution_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    date_reported DATE
);

CREATE TABLE research_investigations (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    allegation_id INT,
    investigation_start_date DATE,
    investigation_end_date DATE,
    findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_misconduct (
    misconduct_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    misconduct_date DATE,
    misconduct_description TEXT,
    investigator_id INT,
    institution_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (investigator_id) REFERENCES investigators (investigator_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES research_institutions (institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  institution_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES ResearchInstitutions (institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MisconductAllegations (
  allegation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
  allegation_date DATE,
  allegation_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers (researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investigations (
  investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  allegation_id INT NOT NULL,
  investigator_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  investigation_date DATE,
  investigation_outcome TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (allegation_id) REFERENCES MisconductAllegations (allegation_id)
);
